original_text: lay his hand on the head of his offering, and kill it in front of the tent of meeting; and Aaron's sons shall throw its blood against the sides of the altar.
korean_text: 그 예물의 머리에 안수하고 회막 앞에서 잡을 것이요 아론의 자손은 그 피를 제단 사방에 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: lay his hand on the head of his offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 제물의 머리에 손을 얹고

sentences.original_text: and kill it in front of the tent of meeting
and Aaron's sons shall throw its blood
sentences.korean_translation: 아론의 아들들은 그 피를 뿌릴 것이니

sentences.original_text: against the sides of the altar.
